sourcesContent:
/**
 * Demo data — 50 movies exactly as requested.
 * All posterUrl = TMDB CDN path → https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500{posterUrl}
 * No API key needed. High quality w500 images.
 */

export const DEMO_MOVIES = [
